issues.message: Unreachable code after all branches return.
issues.description: A project shall not contain unreachable code.

issues.message: Unreachable code after infinite loop.
issues.description: A project shall not contain unreachable code.

issues.message: Unreachable code after exhaustive switch.
issues.description: A project shall not contain unreachable code.

issues.message: Expression result is not used (dead code).
issues.description: There shall be no dead code.

issues.message: Variable modified but never subsequently read.
issues.description: There shall be no dead code.

issues.message: Type 'UnusedLocalPoint' is declared but not used.
issues.description: A project should not contain unused type declarations.

issues.message: Type 'UnusedFileType' is declared but not used.
issues.description: A project should not contain unused type declarations.

issues.message: Tag 'UnusedTag' declared but never used.
issues.description: A project should not contain unused tag declarations.

issues.message: Tag 'UnusedColorTag' declared but never used.
issues.description: A project should not contain unused tag declarations.

issues.message: Macro 'UNUSED_MACRO_BUFFER_SIZE' is defined but never expanded.
issues.description: A project should not contain unused macro declarations.

issues.message: Macro 'TEMP_MACRO' is defined and immediately undefined without expansion.
issues.description: A project should not contain unused macro declarations.

issues.message: Label 'cleanup' is declared but not referenced by any goto.
issues.description: A function should not contain unused label declarations.

issues.message: Label 'unused_label' is declared but not targeted by any goto.
issues.description: A function should not contain unused label declarations.

issues.message: Parameters 'unused_a', 'unused_b' are never referenced.
issues.description: There should be no unused parameters in functions.

issues.message: Parameters 'a', 'b', 'c' are never referenced.
issues.description: There should be no unused parameters in functions.

issues.message: Function has no explicit return type (implicit int).
issues.description: Types shall be explicitly specified.

issues.message: Parameter 'x' has no type specifier in old-style definition.
issues.description: Types shall be explicitly specified.

issues.message: Function prototype parameters are not named.
issues.description: Function types shall be in prototype form with named parameters.

issues.message: Empty parentheses used instead of (void).
issues.description: Function types shall be in prototype form with named parameters.

issues.message: const qualifier missing in definition vs. declaration.
issues.description: All declarations of an object or function shall use the same names and type qualifiers.

issues.message: Parameter names differ between declaration and definition.
issues.description: All declarations of an object or function shall use the same names and type qualifiers.

issues.message: No prior compatible declaration visible for externally linked function.
issues.description: A compatible declaration shall be visible when an object or function with external linkage is defined.

issues.message: Duplicate extern declaration in same translation unit.
issues.description: An external object or function shall be declared once in one and only one file.

issues.message: Multiple tentative definitions of 'rule_8_6_tentative'.
issues.description: An identifier with external linkage shall have exactly one external definition.

issues.message: extern declaration at block scope.
issues.description: Functions and objects should not be defined at block scope.

issues.message: Function with internal linkage is missing static specifier.
issues.description: The static storage class specifier shall be used in all declarations of objects and functions that have internal linkage.

issues.message: File-scope variable 'single_use_var' is only accessed in one function.
issues.description: An object should be defined at block scope if its identifier only appears in a single function.

issues.message: Inline function at file scope without static specifier.
issues.description: An inline function shall be declared with the static storage class.

issues.message: Extern array declared without explicit size.
issues.description: When an array with external linkage is declared, its size should be explicitly specified.

issues.message: Implicit enumeration constant 'B_VAL' has same value as explicit 'C_VAL'.
issues.description: Within an enumerator list, the value of an implicitly-specified enumeration constant shall be unique.

issues.message: Pointer 'data' could be declared as pointing to const.
issues.description: A pointer should point to a const-qualified type whenever possible.

issues.message: Pointer 'p' could be declared as pointing to const.
issues.description: A pointer should point to a const-qualified type whenever possible.

issues.message: The restrict type qualifier is used.
issues.description: The restrict type qualifier shall not be used.

issues.message: Boolean used as operand of arithmetic addition.
issues.description: Operands shall not be of an inappropriate essential type.

issues.message: Enum used as operand of bitwise operator.
issues.description: Operands shall not be of an inappropriate essential type.

issues.message: Signed value used as operand in left-shift.
issues.description: Operands shall not be of an inappropriate essential type.

issues.message: Essentially character type used in relational comparison.
issues.description: Operands shall not be of an inappropriate essential type.

issues.message: Character type used in subtraction.
issues.description: Expressions of essentially character type shall not be used inappropriately in addition and subtraction operations.

issues.message: Character type used in addition with non-character integer.
issues.description: Expressions of essentially character type shall not be used inappropriately in addition and subtraction operations.

issues.message: Character arithmetic used for array indexing.
issues.description: Expressions of essentially character type shall not be used inappropriately in addition and subtraction operations.

issues.message: Unsigned int assigned to unsigned short (narrower type).
issues.description: The value of an expression shall not be assigned to an object with a narrower essential type or of a different essential type category.

issues.message: Signed int assigned to unsigned int (sign loss).
issues.description: The value of an expression shall not be assigned to an object with a narrower essential type or of a different essential type category.

issues.message: Float assigned to int (fractional truncation).
issues.description: The value of an expression shall not be assigned to an object with a narrower essential type or of a different essential type category.

issues.message: Signed and unsigned operands in comparison.
issues.description: Both operands of an operator in which the usual arithmetic conversions are performed shall have the same essential type category.

issues.message: Enum and int mixed in ternary operator.
issues.description: Both operands of an operator in which the usual arithmetic conversions are performed shall have the same essential type category.

issues.message: Signed integer cast to boolean.
issues.description: The value of an expression should not be cast to an inappropriate essential type.

issues.message: Pointer cast to boolean.
issues.description: The value of an expression should not be cast to an inappropriate essential type.

issues.message: Unsigned integer cast to enum.
issues.description: The value of an expression should not be cast to an inappropriate essential type.

issues.message: Composite u16*u16 expression assigned to wider u32.
issues.description: The value of a composite expression shall not be assigned to an object with wider essential type.

issues.message: Composite u8+u8 expression assigned to wider u16.
issues.description: The value of a composite expression shall not be assigned to an object with wider essential type.

issues.message: Composite expression (u16+u16) combined with u32 operand.
issues.description: If a composite expression is used as one operand of an operator in which the usual arithmetic conversions are performed then the other operand shall not have wider essential type.

issues.message: Composite char expression combined with int operand.
issues.description: If a composite expression is used as one operand of an operator in which the usual arithmetic conversions are performed then the other operand shall not have wider essential type.

issues.message: Unsigned composite expression cast to signed.
issues.description: The value of a composite expression shall not be cast to a different essential type category.

issues.message: Integer composite cast to float (integer division already truncated).
issues.description: The value of a composite expression shall not be cast to a different essential type category.

issues.message: Signed composite expression cast to unsigned.
issues.description: The value of a composite expression shall not be cast to a different essential type category.
